headline: Tesla reveals Model Y Performance trim for Europe, where sales are tanking
summary: Tesla unveiled the new Model Y Performance, the high-end variant of the EV maker's volume crossover SUV. Though it's only available in Europe, it will be arriving elsewhere soon.

headline: Why Is Ford Motor (F) Up 5.8% Since Last Earnings Report?

headline: Statement from TRREB, Cornerstone, OREB, OnePoint, and CLAR on Ford Government Review of RECO
summary: TORONTO, Aug. 29, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Ontario's five largest REALTOR® associations, representing more than 90 per cent of the nearly 100,000 REALTORS® in the province, support the Ford government's decision to intervene in the review of the Real Estate Council of Ontario (RECO) following the iPro Realty Ltd. investigation. Our associations welcome a full review of RECO's governance and practices. This process must deliver meaningful reforms, including Ombudsperson oversight, stronger accoun

headline: Ford Stock Can’t Catch a Break. The Recalls Just Keep Coming
summary: “License plate, side marker, and tail lights that fail to illuminate as intended can reduce visibility to other drivers,” the NHTSA notice said about the 2024 and 2025 model year Mustangs.

headline: Does GM's Factory Zero Shift Cut Signal a Slowdown in its EV Push?
summary: General Motors is cutting shifts for its Hummer EV and Escalade IQ at Factory Zero, underscoring weaker U.S. demand.

headline: Latest News In Electric Vehicles - Vehicle-To-Grid Market Set For Rapid Growth
summary: The global Vehicle-to-Grid (V2G) market is anticipated to experience significant growth, rising from $6.3 billion in 2025 to $16.9 billion by 2030, with a compound annual growth rate of 21.7%. V2G technology, which allows electric vehicles to interact with the power grid through bidirectional charging, offers benefits such as grid support, cost reductions, and integration of renewable energy. The rising demand for electric vehicles (EVs), coupled with government incentives and technological...

headline: How Union Vote at Battery Plant Could Impact Ford Stock Valuation in 2025
summary: Thinking about what to do with Ford Motor stock right now? You are not alone. Investors have been paying close attention as Ford’s price tag shifts and new headlines roll in, sometimes with big implications for the company’s long-term direction. Over the past week, Ford shares are up 3.4%, with solid gains of 5.7% over the past month and a striking 21.3% jump year-to-date. That is some strong forward motion, especially when you consider the 13.4% rise over the past year and an eye-popping...

headline: UK adds more electric car models to ECG scheme
summary: The new additions to the ECG scheme include the Ford Puma Gen-E and the Ford e-Tourneo Courier, both with a £3,750 discount.

raw.headline: UK adds more electric car models to ECG scheme

headline: Ford recalls over 105,000 US vehicles due to lighting failure, NHTSA says
summary: Ford Motor Company is recalling more than 105,000 Mustang cars in the U.S., citing improperly sealed panels that may let water seep in and cause external lights to fail, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Friday.

raw.headline: Ford recalls over 105,000 US vehicles due to lighting failure, NHTSA says
raw.summary: Ford Motor Company is recalling more than 105,000 Mustang cars in the U.S., citing improperly sealed panels that may let water seep in and cause external lights to fail, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Friday.

headline: Trump Leans on National Security to Justify Next Wave of Tariffs
summary: The administration plans to expand a certain category of tariffs in hopes of redirecting production to the U.S. and thwarting potential legal threats in the trade war.

raw.headline: Trump Leans on National Security to Justify Next Wave of Tariffs
raw.summary: The administration plans to expand a certain category of tariffs in hopes of redirecting production to the U.S. and thwarting potential legal threats in the trade war.
